committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Government Operations and Metropolitan Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the District of Columbia Stadium Act of 1957 to require the Secretary of the Interior to convey to the government of the District of Columbia all right, title, and interest to the Robert F. Kennedy Memorial Stadium vested in the United States.

summary.text: Amends the District of Columbia Stadium Act of 1957 to direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey to the District of Columbia all Federal rights in the Robert F. Kennedy Memorial Stadium.

titles.title: A bill to amend the District of Columbia Stadium Act of 1957 to require the Secretary of the Interior to convey to the government of the District of Columbia all right, title, and interest to the Robert F. Kennedy Memorial Stadium vested in the United States.
